title: Frequently Asked Questions
subtitle: Everything you need to know about Naveeg

questions.question: How long does it take to generate a website?
questions.answer: Most websites are generated in under 30 seconds. More complex sites with extensive customization might take up to 2 minutes. Our AI works incredibly fast to get you online as quickly as possible.

questions.question: Can I use my own domain name?
questions.answer: Absolutely! You can connect your existing domain or register a new one directly through our platform. We provide step-by-step guidance to help you set everything up.

questions.question: Is there a free trial?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer a 14-day free trial on all plans. You can explore all features without providing a credit card. No commitments, no hidden fees.

questions.question: Do I need any technical knowledge?
questions.answer: Not at all! Naveeg is designed for everyone, regardless of technical background. Our AI handles all the complex technical aspects while you focus on your business content.

questions.question: Can I customize my website after it's generated?
questions.answer: Yes! You can easily customize colors, fonts, layouts, images, and content. Our visual editor makes it simple to make changes without any coding knowledge.

questions.question: Is my website mobile-friendly?
questions.answer: Every website generated by Naveeg is automatically optimized for mobile devices. We follow mobile-first design principles to ensure your site looks great on all screen sizes.

questions.question: What kind of support do you offer?
questions.answer: We provide 24/7 email support on all plans, with priority support for Pro users and phone support for Business customers. Our team is always ready to help you succeed.

questions.question: Can I sell products on my website?
questions.answer: Yes! Our Pro and Business plans include e-commerce features. You can add products, set up payment processing, and start selling online immediately.

questions.question: How secure are the websites?
questions.answer: Security is our top priority. All websites include SSL certificates, regular security updates, and protection against common threats. We maintain 99.9% uptime with enterprise-grade infrastructure.

questions.question: Can I export my website?
questions.answer: Business plan customers can export their website code and host it anywhere they like. This gives you complete freedom and control over your online presence.
